sentences.english: I have resided in Huoshan for 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 我已經在霍山居住了20年。

sentences.english: He was confident on their own can also win city huoshan, then ordered the attack.
sentences.chinese: 他自信靠自己的力量也能拿下霍山城，於是命令進攻。

sentences.english: The MDA content in the stems increased with the age of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 霍山石斛莖中MDA含量隨莖年齡增加而積累。

sentences.english: The bedrock slide is an important apptarance of the seismicity in Huoshan region.
sentences.chinese: 霍山地區基岩滑坡與該區地震活動有重要聯繫。

sentences.english: The leaf is isobilateral, the stoma is quadrilateral and only distributes in lower epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 霍山石斛葉爲等面葉，氣孔四列型，僅分佈於下表皮。

sentences.english: King of delegation led by finally reached the outskirts of the city huoshan huang association army main force.
sentences.chinese: 王團長率領皇協軍主力終於到了霍山城的外圍。
